attributes.action: asking the Prime Minister to "increase the maximum width of trailers to the European recommended 2.55 metres."
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: HELP MAKE THE UK GOVERNMENT BRING THE LAW REGARDING TRAILER WIDTHS IN LINE WITH EUROPEAN LAW , AS IT IS YOU CAN ONLY TOW A TRAILER OF 2.5M  WITH A COMERCIAL VEHICLE. THE MAXIMUM YOU CAN TOW WITH CAR IS 2.3M ONLY 2 INCHES DIFFERNCE.IN THE REST OF EUROPE A CAR CAN TOW A TRAILER OF 2.5M WIDE. THIS DOES NOT CREATE ANY SAFETY ISSUES.
